nodes.documentation: @dev A splitter moves positions and weth collateral from Dealers (using the IDealer interface) to MakerDAO.
nodes.name: Splitter

nodes.documentation:
@dev Moves all WETH debt and collateral from `from` in YDai to `to` in MakerDAO.
 `to` needs to authorize treasury in vat with `_vat.hope(address(_treasury))`.
nodes.name: split

devdoc.details: A splitter moves positions and weth collateral from Dealers (using the IDealer interface) to MakerDAO.

split(address,address).details: Moves all WETH debt and collateral from `from` in YDai to `to` in MakerDAO. `to` needs to authorize treasury in vat with `_vat.hope(address(_treasury))`.
